monsterLeaves(Monster) - Method in class mainenviro.RandomEvent
This method determines if a monster leaves overnight.
monsterLevelUp(Monster) - Method in class mainenviro.RandomEvent
This method determines by random chance if a monster level's up If the monster has won more battles that day, it's more likely to level up
